name: George Black
condition: (Lt. Col. Isaac). Freed by Lawrence Hartshorne as certified
rawEntry: George Black, 35, (Lt. Col. Isaac). Freed by Lawrence Hartshorne as certified

name: Ann Black
condition: ([Lt. Col. Isaac Allen)]. [Freed by Lawrence Hartshorne as certified.]
rawEntry: Ann Black, 25, ([Lt. Col. Isaac Allen)]. [Freed by Lawrence Hartshorne as certified.]

name: Reuben
condition: ([Lt. Col. Isaac Allen. [Freed by Lawrence Hartshorne as certified.]
rawEntry: Reuben, 7, ([Lt. Col. Isaac Allen. [Freed by Lawrence Hartshorne as certified.]

name: Sukey
condition: ([Lt. Col. Isaac Allen]). [Freed by Lawrence Hartshorne as certified.]
rawEntry: Sukey, 5, ([Lt. Col. Isaac Allen]). [Freed by Lawrence Hartshorne as certified.]

name: Billy Williams
rawEntry: Billy Williams, 35, healthy stout man, (Richard Browne). Formerly lived with Mr. Moore of Reedy Island, Caroline, from whence he came with the 71st Regiment about 3 years ago.

name: Rose Richard
rawEntry: Rose Richard, 20, healthy young woman, (Thomas Richard). Property of Thomas Richard, a refugee from Philadelphia.

name: Daniel Barber
rawEntry: Daniel Barber, 70, worn out, (James Moore). Says he was made free by Mr. Austin Moore of little York nigh 20 years ago.

name: Sarah Farmer
rawEntry: Sarah Farmer, 23, healthy young woman, (Mrs. Sharp). Free Negress indented to Mrs. Sharp for one year.

name: Barbarry Allen
rawEntry: Barbarry Allen, 22, healthy stout wench, (Humphry Winters). Property of Humphrey Winters of New York from Virginia.

name: Elizabeth Black
rawEntry: Elizabeth Black, 24, mulatto from Madagascar, (Mr. Buskirk). Free, indented when nine years of age to Mrs. Courtland.

name: Bob Stafford
rawEntry: Bob Stafford, 20, stout healthy Negro, (Mr. Sharp). Taken from Mr. Wilkinson in Virginia by a party from the Royal Navy about four years ago.

name: Harry Covenhoven
rawEntry: Harry Covenhoven, 24, [stout healthy Negro], (Mr. Buskirk). Came in two years ago from Mr. Covenhoven in Jersey.

name: John Vans
rawEntry: John Vans, 39, healthy, blind of his right eye, (Mr. Buskirk, Jr.). Taken in Pennsylvania a party of the British Army about 6Â½ years ago; lived there with Sam Barber who he says had eight months before given him his freedom.

name: Anthony Haln
rawEntry: Anthony Haln, 27, stout Negro, (Nicholas Beckle). His own property willed

name: Joyce
formerOwner: James Moore for 6 years; her father died
rawEntry: Joyce, 12, healthy Negress, (James Moore). Lived with James Moore for 6 years; her father died in the King's service.

name: Simson McGuire
rawEntry: Simson McGuire, 223, stout healthy Negro man, (John Buskirk). Came in to General Arnold in Virginia from Benjamin Hill.

name: Bristol Cobbwine
rawEntry: Bristol Cobbwine, 14, stout healthy Negro boy, (Richard Browne). Came from Woodbury, Charlestown, South Carolina, with Major Grant of the King's American regiment about 4 years ago.

name: Paul
rawEntry: Paul, 19, [stout] mulatto, ([Richard Browne]). Came from Woodbury, Charlestown, South Carolina, with Major Grant of the King's American regiment.

name: Sam Brothers
rawEntry: Sam Brothers, 25, stout Negro man, (Thomas Harrison). Certificate from General Birch formerly lived with Willis Wilkinson in Virginia.

name: Betsy his wife
rawEntry: Betsy his wife, 2 children, 32, 14 & 12, stout & healthy, ([Thomas Harrison]). Certificate from General Birch, formerly lived with Willis Wilkinson in Virginia.

name: Susanna Jarvis
rawEntry: Susanna Jarvis, 22, stout healthy Negress, (John Brown). Indented to J.J. Browne. Says she was made free about nine years ago when Mr. Blowfield died.

name: Dinah Mitchel
condition: [stout healthy Negress] with a child in her arms
rawEntry: Dinah Mitchel, 30, [stout healthy Negress] with a child in her arms, (Matthew Stewart). Left Charlestown from whence she was ordered by Dr. Humphry of the York volunteers then the property of Mitchel.

name: Frank her son
rawEntry: Frank her son, 10, fine boy, (Matthew Stewart). Left Charlestown from whence he was ordered by Dr. Humphry of the York volunteers then the property of Mitchel.

name: Joseph
rawEntry: Joseph, 20, stout lad, sawyer & cooper, (Capt. Richardson of the Ariel). Formerly the property of Col. DeVois whom he left at the taking of Savanna.

name: Clara
rawEntry: Clara, 20, stout wench, (Capt Richardson) of the Ariel) Formerly the property of Col. DeBois whom he left at the taking of Savanna.

name: Sarah Fox
rawEntry: Sarah Fox, 21, stout healthy wench, (John Bettle). Purchased her freedom of Mr. Lowell of Antigua as per his certificate.

name: John Lynch
rawEntry: John Lynch, 18, (stout healthy) lad, (Andrew Ritchse). Certificate form General Birch, formerly the property of Mr. Lynch of South Carolina.

name: Jacob Lynch
rawEntry: Jacob Lynch, 42, stout, blind right eye, (Andrew Ritchse). Certificate from General Birch, formerly the property of Mr. Lynch of South Carolina.

name: Phebe Lynch
rawEntry: Phebe Lynch, 42, stout, little woman, (James Ritchse). Certificate from General Birch, formerly the property of Mr. Lynch of South Carolina.

name: Isaac Corie
rawEntry: Isaac Corie, 27, stout man, (Col. Gilbert). Formerly the property of William Mott of Great Neck, Long Island, a Quaker who gave him his freedom.

name: Hagar Corie
rawEntry: Hagar Corie, 22, stout wench, small child 18 mo. old, (Col. Gilbert). Formerly the property of Joseph Hewlett of Great Neck, Long Island.

name: Josiah Smith
rawEntry: Josiah Smith, 42, stout sawyer & labourer, (Malcom Morrison). Formerly the property of William Smith of Portsmouth, Virginia left it about six years ago.

name: Richard Stanley
rawEntry: Richard Stanley, 39, stout man, (Col. Thomson). Certificate from General Birch, formerly the property of Mr. Stoddart of Jamaica who he says at the time of his death made him free.

name: Paul Coffin
formerOwner: Major Coffin purchased from Mr. Greentree
rawEntry: Paul Coffin, 29, stout labourer, (Major Coffin) , Fanning's reg't.). Property of Major Coffin purchased from Mr. Greentree.

name: Harry
rawEntry: Harry, 23, stout labourer, (Major Coffin, Fanning's reg't.) Property of Major Coffin purchased from Mr. Greentree

name: Phebe
formerOwner: Major Coffin purchased from Mr. Greentree
rawEntry: Phebe, 21, stout wench, (Major Coffin, Fanning's reg't.) Property of Major Coffin purchased from Mr. Greentree.

name: Fortune
rawEntry: Fortune, 35, stout man, (Col. Winslow) Certificate form General Birch, formerly the property of Isaac Warner of Philadelphia.

name: Letitie
rawEntry: Letitie, 26, stout wench, (Col. Winslow. [Certificate from General Birch], freeborn in Mont Serrat.

name: Peter
rawEntry: Peter, 10, stout boy, (Col. Winslow). Certificate from General Birch, freed by Mr. Deane of Jamaica, Long Island.

name: William
rawEntry: William, 22, stout man, (Col. Winslow). Certificate from General Birch, freeborn in Mont Serrat

name: Ceasor & a boy 9 years old
formerOwner: Peter Ryerson with whom he is going to Nova Scotia
rawEntry: Ceasor & a boy 9 years old, 30, stout man, (Peter Ryerson). Property of Peter Ryerson with whom he is going to Nova Scotia.

name: Abraham
rawEntry: Abraham & 21, stout man, (Mr. Edwards). Property of Gideon White but allowed to go with Mr. Edwards to Nova Scotia.

name: Hannah his wife
rawEntry: Hannah his wife, 22, stout wench, (Mr. Edwards). Freeborn on Staten Island both of them having General Birch's certificate.

name: Joe and
rawEntry: Joe and, 36, stout man, labourer, (Lt. Reed Delancey's brigade). His own property.

name: Mary his wife & boy
condition: stout wench. (Lt. Reed Delancey's brigade). His own property.
rawEntry: Mary his wife & boy, 26, stout wench. (Lt. Reed Delancey's brigade). His own property.

name: Abraham
rawEntry: Abraham, 19, stout lad, (John Cutler). Came form Virginia with Lieut. Col. Pennington of the Guards, formerly the property of Peter Rose.

name: Parthenia Stanly
rawEntry: Parthenia Stanly, 35, stout wench & small boy, (Col. Winslow). Free as per Certificate of her late Mrs. Mott.

name: George
rawEntry: George, 13, stout boy, (Capt. Philips). His own property.

name: George
rawEntry: George, 18, stout lad, (Peter Ryerson). Formerly lived with Dennis Hagan in South Carolina to whom he was indented for 20 years; brought from thence by Capt. Gore, 33rd Reg't.

name: Henry
rawEntry: Henry, 47, stout man, (Charles Richards). Formerly the property of Thomas Marren of Old Fairfield whom he left on account of the proclamation of Sir W.W. Howe.

name: Kate & girl 6 years
rawEntry: Kate & girl 6 years, 40, stout wench, (Charles Richards). Formerly the property of Thomas Marron of Old Fairfield whom he left on account of the proclamation of Sir W.W. Howe.

name: Almin
rawEntry: Almin, 32, stout healthy man, (James Richards). Formerly the property of Williams at Tappan in New Jersey, came in on Sir William Howe's proclamation.

name: Isaac
rawEntry: Isaac, 17, stout boy, (Joseph Scribner) Property purchased from Ebenezer Scribner of Setockett, Long Island.

name: Eleanor Hicks
rawEntry: Eleanor Hicks, 13, stout wench born at Rockaway, (Johnson Kearstead). Free, but indented for five years to Johnston Kearstead.

name: Venus & 2 small children
rawEntry: Venus & 2 small children, 25, [stout wench], (Jolly Longshore, Free, indented to him for two years.

name: Peggy Lynch
rawEntry: Peggy Lynch, 18, [stout wench], (William Cross). Formerly the property of Mr. Lynch at Charleston, certificate from General Birch.

name: Samuel Ives
rawEntry: Samuel Ives, 44, stout man, (Capt. Grayson). Sold to Captain Grayson by Jonathan Eilbeck of New York who it does not appear had any right to sell him as he was the property of Capt. Talbot of Virginia from whence he was brought by the troops 5 years go and had a pass from Lt. Clinton which Mr. Eilbeck destroyed.

name: Joe
rawEntry: Joe, 27, [stout man], (Caleb Mallory). His property as per bill of sale produced.

name: Henry Lyon
rawEntry: Henry Lyon, 36, stout fellow, (Capt. James Grayson). Formerly to Andrew Lyon, Horseneck, New England; left him three years past.

name: Phebe Lyon
rawEntry: Phebe Lyon, 40, ordinary wench, (Capt. James Grayson). Formerly to James Lyon, Horseneck, New England; left him three years past.

name: Phillis Lyon
condition: (Capt. James Grayson). Formerly to James Lyon
rawEntry: Phillis Lyon, 5, (Capt. James Grayson). Formerly to James Lyon, Horseneck, New England; left him three years past.

name: Simon White
rawEntry: Simon White, 32, likely lad, M, (on his own bottom). Born free, Redding, Connecticut.

name: Lamb Hewell
rawEntry: Lamb Hewell, 65, nearly worn out, M, (on his own bottom). [born free], South Carolina.

name: Darkas & Child
rawEntry: Darkas & Child, 28, nearly worn out, M, (on his own bottom) Born free, South Carolina.

name: Catharine
rawEntry: Catharine, 66, worn out, M, (on his own bottom). Born free, Norwalk, Connecticut.

name: Moses
rawEntry: Moses, 4, fine boy, M, (on his own bottom). Born free, Norwalk, Connecticut.

name: Dempse Slaughter
rawEntry: Dempse Slaughter, 35, stout fellow, (Jolly Longshore). Says he was born free, that he lived for some time with Dempsee Walls, Norfolk, Virginia.

name: Joseph Collins
condition: stout fellow. Dr. VanBuren of Hackensack
rawEntry: Joseph Collins, 30, stout fellow. Dr. VanBuren of Hackensack, New Jersey, claimant, (John Buskirk). Formerly slave to John Kipp, New York Island, sold by Kipp to Dr. VanBuren, Hackensack, New Jersey, whom he left four years past.

name: Joseph Phillips
rawEntry: Joseph Phillips, 22, stout fellow, (Capt. Grayson). Formerly slave to Phil Hawkins, Jamaica, West Indies; left him about 8 years past.

name: Betsey Collins
rawEntry: Betsey Collins, 30, stout wench, (John Buskirk). Formerly slave to Nicholas Terhune, Hackensack, New Jersey; left him about four years past.

name: Nathaniel Lindsay
rawEntry: Nathaniel Lindsay, 20, stout man, (Cornet Lechmore, KAD). Free born in the Grenades. General Birch's certificate.

name: Edward Lloyd
rawEntry: Edward Lloyd, 19, [stout man], (Trumpeter, KAD). Formerly the property of Ebenezer Cowley of Fairfield who gave him his freedom.

name: John Stewart
rawEntry: John Stewart, 19, [stout man], (Lt. Stewart, KAD). General Birch's certificate says he was born free but formerly lived with John Williamson, Charleston, South Carolina.

name: Peter Moses
rawEntry: Peter Moses, 27, stout man, (Pioneer, KAD). Formerly the property of General Balford of Hampton, Virginia, says that at his death got his freedom about 8 years ago.

name: Stephen Samson
rawEntry: Stephen Samson, 22, stout man, (Cornet Reynolds, KAD). General Birch's certificate; formerly the property of John Whitman of Charlestown, South Carolina who just before he died at New York about 4Â½ years ago gave him his freedom in presence of William Bryant.

name: James Watson
rawEntry: James Watson, 30, stout man, (Cornet Reynolds, KAD). Formerly the property of Mr. Colb at Cheerwas, South Carolina, General Birch's Certificate.

name: Dick Jackson
rawEntry: Dick Jackson, 21, stout man, (Trumpeter, [KAD]). Formerly the property of Col. Lloyd of Maryland, free as certified by General Birch.

name: Joseph Kelley
rawEntry: Joseph Kelley, 25, stout mulatto, (Pioneer, KAD) Free agreeable to General Birch's certificate, till 21 years of age lived at Sam Hopkin's of Satocket.

name: Edmund Hill
rawEntry: Edmund Hill, 21, stout man, (Pioneer, KAD). General Birch's Certificate to be free formerly the property of Lewis Adams of Somerset County, New Jersey.

name: Andrew Hilton
rawEntry: Andrew Hilton, 22, stout mulatto, (Pioneer, KAD,). Free by General Birch's certificate, says he was born in the family of Basil Brooks, Benedict County, Maryland; his other an Indian.

name: Charles Allen
rawEntry: Charles Allen, 25, stout, M, between an Indian & Span., (Pioneer, KAD). Free by General Birch's certificate says he lived with Matthew Hobbs of Sussex County, Maryland, until 25.

name: William Hanson
rawEntry: William Hanson, 22, stout, (Capt. Fulton, KAD). Free by General Birch's Certificate, formerly lived with Mr. Hanson in Maryland from whom he was taken by an armed boat about a year ago.

name: Gabriel Dickenson
rawEntry: Gabriel Dickenson, 22, stout, (Pioneer, KAD). Free by General Birch's certificate. Free born at North Castle, New York Government.

name: Charles Terrill
condition: stout (Trumpeter KAD). Free by General Birch's certificate; formerly the property of Mr. John Murphy
rawEntry: Charles Terrill, 21, stout (Trumpeter KAD). Free by General Birch's certificate; formerly the property of Mr. John Murphy, Richmond, Virginia.

name: John Frederick
formerOwner: Lord Baltimore who gave him his freedom
rawEntry: John Frederick, 21Â½, stout, (Trumpeter, KAD). Free by General Birch's certificate; formerly the property of Lord Baltimore who gave him his freedom.

name: Pompey Brown
rawEntry: Pompey Brown, 21, stout, Maj. Murray, (KAD). General Birch's certificate Proclamation. Formerly the property of Richard Stevens, Back Society, New Jersey.

name: Joseph Williams
rawEntry: Joseph Williams, 23, stout, (Pioneer, KAD). General Birch's Certificate Proclamation. Free, formerly the property of John Walker, North Carolina

name: Will Higginson
rawEntry: Will Higginson, 223, stout, (Cornet Nicollson, KAD). General Birch's Certificate Proclamation. Formerly the property of Capt. Billings of (blank).

name: Abraham Marrian
rawEntry: Abraham Marrian, 25, stout (Lt. Tarbell, KAD) General Birch's Certificate Proclamation. Formerly the property of General Marion.

name: Scipio Jenkins
rawEntry: Scipio Jenkins, 16, stout boy, (Cornet Freeman, KAD). General Birch's Certificate Proclamation. Formerly the property of Benjamin Jenkins, Charlestown, South Carolina.

name: James Jenkins
rawEntry: James Jenkins, 23, stout man, (Lt. Davidson, KAD). General Birch's Certificate Proclamation. Formerly the property of Benjamin Jenkins, Charlestown, South Carolina.

name: Joseph Stewart
rawEntry: Joseph Stewart, 15, stout boy, (Capt. Stewart KAD). General Birch's Certificate Proclamation. Formerly the property of Crawford, Middletown, Jersey.

name: Henry Cruden
rawEntry: Henry Cruden, 13, stout boy, (Col. Thomson, KAD). Given to Col. Thomson by Col. Cruden.

name: Hester Walton
rawEntry: Hester Walton, 28, stout, blind of an eye, (Cornet Nicolson, KAD). Formerly Mr. Colb's, South Carolina; left him 4 years ago. General Birch's Certificate.

name: George Greenard
rawEntry: George Greenard, 19, stout mulatto, (Capt. Fulton, KAD), Formerly served Mr. Greenard at Charlestown; left it with Sir Henry Clinton's Army. GBC.

name: Hector Micuro
rawEntry: Hector Micuro, 23, stout mulatto, (Trumpeter KAD). Formerly servant to Mr. Pyate at Charlestown; left it with Col. Thompson, GBC.

name: Daniel Green
rawEntry: Daniel Green, 20, stout black, (Trumpeter, KAD). Given free by Captain Williams, Master of a Transport in England. GBC.

name: William Dixon
rawEntry: William Dixon, 18, stout black, (Lt. Jones, KAD). Formerly slave to Mr. Glenn near Charlestown; left that five years ago. GBC.

name: Silvia Bailley
rawEntry: Silvia Bailley, 26, thin wench, black, (Major Murray, KAD). Formerly servant to Thomas Heartley, Georgia; sent from thence by Col. Cruger. GBC.

name: Nancy Bailley
rawEntry: Nancy Bailley, 9, thin wench, black, (Major Murray, KAD). Formerly servant to Thomas Heartley, Georgia; sent from thence by Col. Cruger.

name: Joe Bailley
rawEntry: Joe Bailley, 7, thin wench, black, (Major Murray, KAD). Formerly servant to Thomas Heartley, Georgia; sent from thence by Col. Cruger.

name: Thomas Morgan
rawEntry: Thomas Morgan, 21, lame of the left arm, (Lt. Jones, KAD). Formerly slave to Mr. Theophilas Morgan, Killingsworth, Connecticut; left him one year ago. GBC

name: Israel Crawford
condition: stout blind of the righty eye
rawEntry: Israel Crawford, 27, stout blind of the righty eye, (Lt. Tomlinson. KAD). Formerly servant to John Griffin at Campden. Left him two years ago. GBC

name: James Anthony
rawEntry: James Anthony, 20, stout (Capt. Fulton, KAD). Formerly slave to John Smith, Statia who left the Negro & went to England & the latter afterwards joined the army 6 years ago. GBC

name: Samuel Edmond
rawEntry: Samuel Edmond, 38, remarkably tall & stout, (Lt. Jones, KAD). Served Liven Ballad, Nancook town, to the years of 21. GBC

name: Jeremy Dyer
rawEntry: Jeremy Dyer, 20, tall and stout, (Cornet Parks, KAD). Formerly slave to Samuel Dyer, Rhode Island; left him with the troops four years ago.

name: George Roberts
rawEntry: George Roberts, 30, stout, (Capt. Humble, Ship Adventure). Free born, totally ignorant of the place of his birth. GBC

name: Hannah Roberts
rawEntry: Hannah Roberts, 30, healthy, (Capt. Humble, Ship Adventure). Free born at Bermuda. GBC

name: Clarisa Roberts
rawEntry: Clarisa Roberts, 6, healthy, (Capt. Humble, Ship Adventure). Born free.

name: Sam Everly
rawEntry: Sam Everly, 30, stout and tall, (Major Murray, KAD). Free man, formerly slave to Mr. Thomas Everley at Charlestown.

name: Judith Everly
rawEntry: Judith Everly, 18, squat, stout wench, Guinea born (Major Murray, KAD). Formerly slave to Mr. Everly.

name: Joyce Moses
rawEntry: Joyce Moses, 20, healthy mulatto wench, (R.A. Dragoon). Says she was born free in the West Indies.

name: Tilley Moses
rawEntry: Tilley Moses, 12, healthy mulatto wench, (R.A. Dragoon). Born free in Virginia.

name: Elsia Daughty
rawEntry: Elsia Daughty, 19, stout mulatto, half Indian, (R.A. Dragoon). Free born and served Ben Doughty at Flushing, 18 years.

name: Sally Terrell
rawEntry: Sally Terrell, 22, stout mulatto, half Indian, (R.A. Dragoon). Formerly slave to Mr. Graham, Jamaica, West Indies.

name: Lucy Letchmore
rawEntry: Lucy Letchmore, 22, stout, black, (R.A. Dragoon). Formerly slave to Mr. Barker, South Carolina; came to New York about 8 years ago with Captain Lawson, bridge master.

name: Keatie Dyer
rawEntry: Keatie Dyer, 25, stout mulatto wench, (Cornet Reynolds, KAD). Formerly servant to Mr. Dyer, Rhode Island, and left that place with the troops six years ago.

name: Bella Jenkins
rawEntry: Bella Jenkins, 24, stout mulatto wench, (Cornet Freeman, KAD.) Formerly slave to Mr. Wigfall, Charlestown, left in the year 1780. G.B. Certificate.

name: Bill Tyng
rawEntry: Bill Tyng, 16, stout black, (Colonel Tyng). Slave received from Capt. Tyng in Jamaica.

name: John Tyng
rawEntry: John Tyng, 19, stout black, (Colonel Tyng). Slave bred in his service.

name: Dinah Tyng
rawEntry: Dinah Tyng, 20, low wench, (Colonel Tyng). Slave bred in his service.

name: Juliet Tyng
rawEntry: Juliet Tyng, 5, mulatto, (Colonel Tyng). Slave bred in his service.

name: Lewis Carter
rawEntry: Lewis Carter, 20, mustee, (Colonel Tyng). Formerly servant to Archibald Gilbert, Virginia; left his service about 4 years ago and came with the troops of New York.

name: Effie Douglas
rawEntry: Effie Douglas, 24, mulatto, (Colonel Tyng). Free woman.

name: John Banter
rawEntry: John Banter, 2, mulatto boy, (Colonel Tyng). Free man.

name: Thomas Banter
rawEntry: Thomas Banter, 24, stout black, (Colonel Tyng). Formerly slave to Albert Banter, Paramus, New Jersey; left him about six years ago. GBC

name: Moses Simson
rawEntry: Moses Simson, 20 stout black, (George Leonard, Esq.) Formerly slave to William Sheppard, Virginia; left him about five years ago and came to New York with the troops. GBC.

name: Lieut. Berry
rawEntry: Lieut. Berry, 42, stout black, (George Leonard, Esq.). Formerly slave to James Berry, Frederick town, Virginia; left him about six years ago. GBC

name: Ishmael Colley
rawEntry: Ishmael Colley, 23, stout black, (George Leonard, Esq.). Formerly slave to Ebenezer Colley, Connecticut, town Fairfield; left him about six years ago. GBC

name: Sarah Caesor
rawEntry: Sarah Caesor, 25, squat wench, (George Leonard, Esq.). Free, formerly slave to Jonathan Vallantane, Hamstead Plains, made her free at his death.

name: Lucey Lykes
rawEntry: Lucey Lykes, 24, squat wench, (George Leonard, Esq.). Formerly slave to John Woodward, New Jersey, taken from thence about six years ago by Capt. Robinson, commanding a galley. GBC.

name: George Kent
rawEntry: George Kent, 30, tall stout fellow, (George Leonard, Esq.). Formerly slave to Mr. Lockart, Antigua. GBC.

name: Joseph Talbot
rawEntry: Joseph Talbot, 28, stout fellow, (James Sutter). Formerly slave to Job McPherson, Charlestown; left him about 7 years ago, came to New York with General Patterson. GBC.

name: Nancy Talbot
rawEntry: Nancy Talbot, 21, health seemingly sound, (James Sutter). Formerly slave to Daniel Strooger of Charlestown; left him about four years ago, came to New York with General Patterson. GBC.

name: Simon Gairway
rawEntry: Simon Gairway, 26, stout man, (William Johnson). Served Jenkin Philips, Pennsylvania, 21 years when he got his freedom; left him about four years ago. GBC.

name: Jack Smith
rawEntry: Jack Smith, 31, tall stout man, (John McNeal). Formerly slave to Jacomiah Smith of Elizabeth town who he left about five years ago.

name: William Williams
rawEntry: William Williams, 25, middle sized man, (William Johnson). Formerly slave to Sam Williams of Pennsylvania; left him about three years ago. GBC.

name: Jacob Lawson
rawEntry: Jacob Lawson, 30, stout man, (Mr. Dewit). Formerly slave to Col. Lawson of Princess Ann, Virginia. GBC

name: Ruth
rawEntry: Ruth his wife, (age not listed), (Mr, Dewit). Formerly slave to Henry Corneck, Virginia; left him about 6 years ago.

name: Luke Brian
rawEntry: Luke Brian, 25, stout man, (William Johnson). Says he was born free in the family of Mr. Warrington, Seabrook, Connecticut; left him two years ago.

name: Harry Gray
rawEntry: Harry Gray, 30, stout man, (John Hoke). Formerly slave to Benjamin Churchwell of Rappahannock, Virginia; left him six years ago.

name: Abby his wife
rawEntry: Abby his wife, 28, stout wench, 3 scars in her face, (John Hoke). Formerly slave to Benjamin Churchwell of Rappahannock, Virginia; left him six years ago.

name: Sam Dickinson
rawEntry: Sam Dickinson, 24, stout tall man, (Robert French). Formerly slave to Thomas Hunt, Philip's Manor, in the year 1776 taken in arms by Capt. Daniel Kipp.

name: Thomas Foster
rawEntry: Thomas Foster, 28, stout, scar in his forehead, (Francis Hunter). Formerly slave to John Harbeck of New York. His master left him there in the year 76 since which he has served & done duty in the Black Company.

name: Jack Gordon
rawEntry: Jack Gordon, 40, stout , middle size, blemish left eye, (John Miller). Formerly slave to Benjamin Gordon, Charlestown who he says gave him his freedom about 4 years ago.

name: Fanny
city: England where she got her freedom 6 years ago
rawEntry: Fanny, 33, stout wench, 3 scars in each cheek, (James Fraser). Formerly slave to Mr. Cunningham who died in England where she got her freedom 6 years ago. GBC.

name: Eleanor Foster
rawEntry: Eleanor Foster, 34, thin wench, (Francis Hunter). Appears to be free to the satisfaction of Mr. Parker.

name: George Lacy
condition: stout man marked with small pox
rawEntry: George Lacy, 42, stout man marked with small pox, (John Finch). Born free in the family of Mr. Churchill in Virginia with whom he served until 30 years of age. GBC.

name: Fanny his wife
city: her mother being a white woman; served 31 years with George McCall
rawEntry: Fanny his wife, 33, stout mulatto wench, (John Finch). Born free, her mother being a white woman; served 31 years with George McCall, Rappahannock, Virginia. GBC.

name: Kate her daughter
rawEntry: Kate her daughter, 16, stout mulatto wench, (John Finch). Free.

name: Guinea
formerOwner: Captain Brew who brought him from Jamaica
rawEntry: Guinea, 21, stout, cut in his right eye, Guinea born, (John Miller). Formerly slave to Captain Brew who brought him from Jamaica in the West Indies who he says gave him his freedom. GBC.

name: Harry Squash
rawEntry: Harry Squash, 22, stout middle sized, (Mr. Lynch). Property of Mr. Lynch, purchased from Captain Huddleston, Royal Artillery.

name: Deborah his wife
rawEntry: Deborah his wife, 20, stout wench, thick lips, pock marked, (Mr. Lynch). Formerly slave to General Washington, came away about 4 years ago.

name: Sam Bayard
rawEntry: Sam Bayard, 45, stout tall man, (Matthew Tankard). Formerly slave to Peter Bayard, New Jersey, came off about 5 years ago.

name: George May
rawEntry: George May, 34, stout fellow, (James Dowell). Formerly slave to Mr. Radlow, Jamaica, West Indies; came to New York about 9 years ago in a transport.

name: William Mannan
rawEntry: William Mannan, 27, thin lathy fellow, (Richard White). Formerly slave to George Sobriskey at Oldbridge, Jersey, about 7 years ago.

name: Henry McGrigger
rawEntry: Henry McGrigger, 24, stout fellow, (Alpheus Palmer). Formerly slave to Thomas Haywood, Charlestown; joined the British troops under the command of General Provost on its march near Charlestown.

name: Peter Randall
rawEntry: Peter Randall, 23, stout fellow, (William Cassels). Formerly slave to James Field in Petersburg, Virginia whom he left 4 years ago & came to New York.

name: Robert Blew
formerOwner: Captain Gills who left him with Parson turner which parson he left 4 years ago & joined the British troops
rawEntry: Robert Blew, 30, stout fellow, (Richard White). Formerly a servant to Captain Gills who left him with Parson turner which parson he left 4 years ago & joined the British troops at Norfolk in Consequence of Proclamation.

name: Sippio Simmons
rawEntry: Sippio Simmons, 26, stout lad, (Richard White). Given to General Provost by General Haldin and on the General's death left him free.

name: Jacob Miles
rawEntry: Jacob Miles, 36, stout fellow, (James Dowell). Came with the troops from Philadelphia to New York; says he was born free at Dover, Pennsylvania.

name: Williiam Fortune
rawEntry: Williiam Fortune, 40, stout man, (Mr. Ray). Formerly slave to John Morgan at Harrington, New Jersey, came in on the strength of General Howe's proclamation 6 years past. GBC.

name: Samuel Wyllie
